lead_paragraph: Enthusiasm for President Yahya Jammeh’s rival has put into question the outcome of the country’s election and prompted fears of instability and violence.

headline.print_headline: A Vow to Lead for Life  Faces a Vote in Gambia
headline.main: Gambia’s Leader Vowed to Rule for a Billion Years. A Vote Will Test That.

snippet: Enthusiasm for President Yahya Jammeh’s rival has put into question the outcome of the country’s election and prompted fears of instability and violence....
abstract: Voters in Gambia are set to vote on whether to reinstall Pres Yahya Jammeh, who came to power over two decades ago and has said he plans to stay in office indefinitely; outcome of election has become uncertain in wake of surge of enthusiasm for Adama Barrow, opposition coalition candidate, sparking fears of violence and instability.
